definition: A numerical value that represents the heaviness or mass of an object, typically measured in units such as kilograms or pounds. It is commonly used in various contexts, including physics, engineering, and everyday life, to quantify the amount of force exerted by an object due to gravity.

examples.german: Das Gewicht des Pakets betr채gt 2 Kilogramm.
examples.english: The weight of the package is 2 kilograms.

examples.german: Sie hat in kurzer Zeit viel Gewicht verloren.
examples.english: She has lost a lot of weight in a short time.

examples.german: Das Gewicht der Last ist zu schwer f체r mich.
examples.english: The weight of the load is too heavy for me.

examples.german: Er hebt Gewichte, um seine Muskeln zu st채rken.
examples.english: He lifts weights to strengthen his muscles.

examples.german: Das Gewicht des Buches betr채gt 500 Gramm.
examples.english: The weight of the book is 500 grams.
